body.name: Cora Organic Applicator Tampon Multipack | 18 Light, 36 Regular, and 18 Super Absorbency | 100% Organic Cotton, Unscented, Plant-Based Compact Applicator | Leak Protection | 72 Count Total
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 18 mins
features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and Toxic Free Tampons
reviews.reviewText: Love these clean and toxin free tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a Kotex security tampon replacement!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using Kotex security tampons forever until they discontinued. Everything else it was horrible. Finally I found these, and they are the same applicator and the string has the knot at the end for easy pull out. If you’re looking for a replacement for Kotex, security tampons, this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’ve personally had such a hard time finding tampons that don’t leak, large part of the problem is that my uterus likes to think she’s Niagara Falls, but these tampons have changed my life. I’m willing to wear white pants as long as I know I’ve got these bad boys. And mega extra points for them being 100% cotton, before I found this brand I never realized how many uncesseaary chemicals were in your generic tampons. I really can’t suggest these enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All I use now, I love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Okay this is tmi but once they have fluid in them they are uncomfortable to take out. It’s like it has ridges. That’s not for all of them, I don’t have this issue with the size super tampons, but the regulars HURT BADDDD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Since switching to natural and organic products, my body has been doing much better with hormones and my cycles including less painful cycles and less cramping and even less blood. This product has appealing and easy to use packaging and applicator and the absorbency is great. Both my daughter and I love this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd recommend them.
reviews.reviewText: The absorbency is comparable to that of any Tampax or Playtex brands in my opinion. Packaging is a little flimsy, but I believe that's because of it's recyclability. Comfort could be better, if we're talking about the applicator. I've read lots of complaints about the applicators "deployment" difficulties... I've only ever had it "not properly deploy" once, and that was one of the 'light' sized ones. I've been using this brand for over a year, so I think the odds are good for having no problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Natural Product That Helps Others!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried MANY different natural feminine products...and CORA by far is the best!!! The absorbency rate is great, although sometimes may feel like I need to switch out slightly sooner, I am OK with this. They are super comfortable. I have only had trouble with one of the applicators one time, and it was partly due to user error. I also like that with each purchase they help another female in need by sending feminine hygiene products. I wish that I could choose how many of each absorption levels I needed, but regardless I will continue to purchase CORA for my feminine hygiene needs. Thank you!!!
